product_name: Ibex Arrivee Bike Bib Shorts - Men's
long_description: With their natural wool and spandex blend, the men's Ibex Arrivee Bike Bib Shorts resist odor and regulate temperature better than standard bibs to provide excellent comfort in the saddle. Bibs allow for comfortable riding with the least constriction around your waist. Upper part of bib is made of New Zealand merino wool that breathes well and resists odor naturally. Bottoms are made of New Zealand merino wool, a small amount of nylon for extra strength, and spandex to make sure the shorts fit snugly and move with you. Wool is a natural fiber that excels at temperature regulation, especially for stop-and-go sports such as cycling. Multidimensional 8mm chamois provides comfort in the saddle. Ibex Arrivee Bike Bibs are soft, durable and machine washable.
short_description: With their natural wool and spandex blend, the men's Ibex Arrivee Bike Bib Shorts resist odor and regulate temperature better than standard bibs to provide excellent comfort in the saddle.
